Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 9 shows the incident photon - to - current conversion efficiency ( IPCE ) spectra of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PFDTBT-10Per + PC71BM / LiF and TiO x / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PFDTBT-10Per |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| TiO x |
| Al |

These are the materials mentioned in the paragraph, and they are used in the devices whose incident photon-to-current conversion efficiency (IPCE) spectra are shown in Figure 9.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the list of entities, I have determined that all of them clearly refer to material names. Here is the updated Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PFDTBT-1
